Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max

Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of max(15, 13) is

Question 2.
The type of max(7, 6.31517926837769200) is

Question 3. 
max(-12.40641003151963200, 5.34361033277072400) ==

Question 4. 
max(-1, ) == 15

Question 5. 
max(6, ) == 6
